TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ServiceContractGenerationContext extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Passed to the method to enable the modification of a service contract and its context prior to generating code.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationContext> object passed to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceContractGenerationExtension.GenerateContract%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to modify the code document object model prior to the generation of code. Typically, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceContractGenerationExtension?displayProperty=fullName> interface is implemented on a custom <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension?displayProperty=fullName> implementation that is used to import custom WSDL elements or otherwise modify the code at the service or operation level. To modify the code at the operation level, see <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationContractGenerationExtension?displayProperty=fullName>.
## Examples The following example shows the use of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationContext> object passed to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceContractGenerationExtension.GenerateContract%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to add code comments extracted from custom WSDL elements.
[!code-csharp[C_CustomWSDLExtensions#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_customwsdlextensions/cs/wsdldocumentationimporter.cs#12)]
The following code example shows the resulting code comments.
[!code-csharp[C_CustomWSDLExtensions#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_customwsdlextensions/cs/newgeneratedcontract.cs#13)] [!code-vb[C_CustomWSDLExtensions#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_customwsdlextensions/cs/newgeneratedcontract.vb#13)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationContext.Contract%2A> property to examine the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription?displayProperty=fullName> for the current contract.

Docs.summary: Gets the for the current contract.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationContext.ContractType%2A> property to examine or modify the <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration?displayProperty=fullName> for the current contract before the code is generated.
## Examples The following example shows the use of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationContext> object passed to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceContractGenerationExtension.GenerateContract%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to add code comments extracted from custom WSDL elements.
[!code-csharp[C_CustomWSDLExtensions#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_customwsdlextensions/cs/wsdldocumentationimporter.cs#12)]
The following code example shows the resulting code comments.
[!code-csharp[C_CustomWSDLExtensions#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_customwsdlextensions/cs/newgeneratedcontract.cs#13)] [!code-vb[C_CustomWSDLExtensions#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_customwsdlextensions/cs/newgeneratedcontract.vb#13)]

Docs.summary: Gets the for the duplex callback contract on the service contract.
Docs.value: The for the duplex callback contract on the service contract.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationContext.DuplexCallbackType%2A> property to examine or modify the <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration?displayProperty=fullName> for the duplex callback contract on the service contract prior to generating code.

Docs.summary: Gets a collection of objects that represent the contract operations.
Docs.value: A collection of objects that represent the contract operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationContext.Operations%2A> property to examine or modify the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationContractGenerationContext?displayProperty=fullName> objects that represent the contract operations.

Docs.summary: Gets the that is to generate the contract.
Docs.value: The that is to generate the contract.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationContext.ServiceContractGenerator%2A> property to examine or modify the code generator that is to create the contract code.
